template<int TNumLanes>

Remarks

Holds the solver

int32 ManifoldPointBeginIndex  
int32 MaxManifoldPoints Each lane has space for MaxManifoldPoints, but not all will be used Unused manifold points may be in the middle of the list (if disabled for example)
